title: Sun2k
author: Sun2k
created_time: January 14, 2023, 11:05:30 AMLast edit: January 14, 2023, 07:23:47 PM by Sun2k
content: Hi everyone, Why is the price of BTCST on poloniex around $12 but on other exchanges it is $0.89?Thanks

comments.author: franky1
comments.created_time: January 14, 2023, 11:27:00 AMLast edit: January 14, 2023, 12:17:19 PM by franky1
comments.body: Quote from: Sun2k on January 14, 2023, 11:05:30 AMHi everyone, Why is the price of BTC on poloniex around $12 but on other exchanges it is $0.89?Thanks BTC?i just checked poloniexBTC / USDT 20684.00 ≈$20705.55 i think what you are looking at is NOT bitcoinbut some altcoins/sidechain token phishing to be bitcoinedit. seems he is talking about Sh*tToken not BTC

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Quote from: franky1 on January 14, 2023, 11:27:00 AM think what you are looking at is NOT bitcoinbut some altcoins/sidechain token phishing to be bitcoinIt is some coin named Bitcoin standard hashrate[1]. Never heard of it before now.This post could be a scam attempt to attract users to certain exchanges so they can lose their money while trying to gain big from arbitrage.[1] https://www.coinbase.com/price/btc-standard-hashrate-token- Jay -

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: Sun2k on January 14, 2023, 11:05:30 AMHi everyone, Why is the price of BTC on poloniex around $12 but on other exchanges it is $0.89?Thanks "BTCST has undergone a 1:10 token redenomination on March 15th 2021 following the STP-4 Proposal. For more information: please refer to https://btcst.medium.com/btcst-to-implement-results-of-stp-4-1-10-redenomination-the-week-of-march-15-872c9ea3d5b7"https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/btc-standard-hashrate-token/markets/So its possible that one exchange already switched to new tokens at a rate 1:10. So the spread is 8.9$ to 12$ not 89 cents to 12$. So much lower but still a lot which can be caused by locked withdrawals on one of exchanges.

comments.author: buwaytress
comments.body: Just to alert OP. It's a common exchange scam, you find it all over socials, Discord, Telegram. People coming in and telling you about the huge difference in spread on either a fake/crap coin like you posted, or a fake exchange (you deposit your coins there expecting to sell it at huge profit margin but it's just a giant sinkhole).For the former, look up the chain. For the latter, look up the exchange and/or deposit exchange.

comments.author: pawel7777
comments.body: Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on January 14, 2023, 12:52:48 PMQuote from: Sun2k on January 14, 2023, 11:05:30 AMHi everyone, Why is the price of BTC on poloniex around $12 but on other exchanges it is $0.89?Thanks "BTCST has undergone a 1:10 token redenomination on March 15th 2021 following the STP-4 Proposal. For more information: please refer to https://btcst.medium.com/btcst-to-implement-results-of-stp-4-1-10-redenomination-the-week-of-march-15-872c9ea3d5b7"https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/btc-standard-hashrate-token/markets/So its possible that one exchange already switched to new tokens at a rate 1:10. So the spread is 8.9$ to 12$ not 89 cents to 12$. So much lower but still a lot which can be caused by locked withdrawals on one of exchanges.Could be it, but it could also likely be a result of an extremely low volume. According to CMC, the daily volume on Poloniex is a whopping $20.63, meaning anyone can manipulate the price anywhere they want at almost no cost at all.Anyhow, this belongs to Altcoin discussion.

comments.author: Sun2k
comments.body: Thank you all..I posted here because the BTCST is used to mine BTC@Tytanowy Janusz, Yes I knew there was a redenomination.. but the price is 0.89$ not 8.9$
